title: Locate
text: Locate the hundreds place in the number
speech: Locate the hundreds place in the number
pacedSpeech: Locate the hundreds place in the number

title: Value
text: What is the value of the hundreds place?
speech: What is the value of the hundreds place?
pacedSpeech: What is the value of the hundreds place?

title: Next Value
text: Check the next value to the right of thr indicated hundreds number
speech: Check the next value to the right of thr indicated hundreds number
pacedSpeech: Check the next value to the right of thr indicated hundreds number

title: Rule
text: If the number to the right of the hundreds number is greater than or equal to $$5$$ then add one to the hundreds place number and make everything after to 0s. If it is less than $$5$$, then leave the hundreds place number the same and change everything after to 0s.
speech: If the number to the right of the hundreds number is greater than or equal to  5  then add one to the hundreds place number and make everything after to 0s. If it is less than  5 , then leave the hundreds place number the same and change everything after to 0s.
pacedSpeech: If the number to the right of the hundreds number is greater than or equal to   5
then add one to the hundreds place number and make everything after to 0s. If it is less than   5
, then leave the hundreds place number the same and change everything after to 0s.
